actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: A bill to limit the authority of the Secretary of Energy and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to use any procedure of expedited consideration in determining whether or not to issue a certificate of public convenience and necessity for construction of certain natural gas pipelines.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Energy and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission from using expedited procedures when considering whether to issue a certificate of public convenience and necessity for the construction of a natural gas pipeline longer than 25 miles.

titles.title: A bill to limit the authority of the Secretary of Energy and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to use any procedure of expedited consideration in determining whether or not to issue a certificate of public convenience and necessity for construction of certain natural gas pipelines.
